definition[0]: a thin wall that separates one part of a room from another
definition[1]: the action of separating a country into two or more independent countries
definition[2]: to divide a country, building, or room into two or more parts
definition[3]: a thin wall that divides one part of a large room from another, for example in an OPEN-PLAN office
definition[4]: one of the parts that a computerâ€™s memory, such as a hard disk, is divided into
